OpenApiSettings.Title: Research Information Hub
OpenApiSettings.Description:
Information from the national Research Information Hub can be utilized through this interface. The same information can also be browsed through the [Research.fi](https://research.fi) portal.

The first version of the interface was published in early 2023, and the following data content from the Research Information Hub is searchable for the time being:

- Funding calls
- Funding decisions
- Publications
- Research datasets

The use of the interface is subject to the approval of the Ministry of Education and Culture, the registrar of the Research Information Hub. Application for access rights and interface information content can be accessed: [https://wiki.eduuni.fi/x/EsQhFg](https://wiki.eduuni.fi/x/EsQhFg)

In addition to access rights, all users of the interface must also identify themselves, instructions on how to authenticate to the interface are available: [https://wiki.eduuni.fi/x/GMQhFg](https://wiki.eduuni.fi/x/GMQhFg)

Finnish translations for the Swagger documentation: [https://wiki.eduuni.fi/x/oFyZFw](https://wiki.eduuni.fi/x/oFyZFw)
